channel.title: C2C_Blog
channel.subtitle: 辰呀
channel.description: 靠代码行数来衡量开发进程，就好比用重量来衡量飞机制造的进度

item.title: Vue
item.description: <h1 id="常用指令"><a class="anchor" href="#常用指令">#</a> 常用指令</h1> <figure class="highlight html"><figcaption data-lang="HTML"></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>!--</span> <span class="token attr-name">&lt;!--swig￼0--</span><span class="token punctuation">></span></span> --></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="2"></td><td><pre>插值</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="3"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="4"></td><td><pre>bind-- 数据绑定: v-bind :被绑定对象=”</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="5"></td><td><pre>model-- 双向数据绑定： v-model (默认值为value) v-model=""</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="6"></td><td><pre>on-- 点击事件绑定： v-on:click="" @click=""</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="7"></td><td><pre>if/show 显示标签 v-if="布尔值" / v-show="表达式" if-->删除 show-->隐藏</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="8"></td><td><pre>v-for 循环列表渲染 v-for="(value,index) in/of 数组/对象 "</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="9"></td><td><pre>v-text 插入文本--替换控件文本 <span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>div</span> <span class="token attr-name">v-text</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>name<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span><span class="token punctuation">></span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>div</span><span class="token punctuation">></span></span> --不支持结构解析</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="10"></td><td><pre>v-html 插入文本 <span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>div</span> <span class="token attr-name">v-html</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>&lt;h1>内容&lt;/h1><span class="token punctuation">"</span></span><span class="token punctuation">></span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>div</span><span class="token punctuation">></span></span> --支持内容解析</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="11"></td><td><pre>v-cloak 隐藏未加载数据的符号 隐藏符号搭配style&#123;[cloak]&#123;display:none&#125;&#125; <span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>h2</span> <span class="token attr-name">v-cloak</span><span class="token punctuation">></span></span><span class="token comment"></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>h2</span><span class="token punctuation">></span></span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="12"></td><td><pre>v-once 初始渲染后变为静态资源，显示初始值（标签内） <span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>h2</span> <span class="token attr-name">v-once</span><span class="token punctuation">></span></span><span class="token comment"></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>h2</span><span class="token punctuation">></span></span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="13"></td><td><pre>v-pre 跳过不解析后面的内容（标签内）</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="14"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="15"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="16"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment">&lt;!-- v-bind 标签内 数据流动单向 --data 流入页面 --></span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="17"></td><td><pre><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>a</span> <span class="token attr-name"><span class="token namespace">v-bind:</span>href</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>data<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span><span class="token punctuation">></span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>a</span><span class="token punctuation">></span></span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="18"></td><td><pre><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>a</span> <span class="token attr-name">:href</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>data<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span><span class="token punctuation">></span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>a</span><span class="token punctuation">></span></span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="19"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="20"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment">&lt;!-- v-model 标签内 数据流动双向 -- 默认值为 value --></span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="21"></td><td><pre><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>a</span> <span class="token attr-name"><span class="token namespace">v-model:</span>href</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>data<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span><span class="token punctuation">></span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>a</span><span class="token punctuation">></span></span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="22"></td><td><pre><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>input</span> <span class="token attr-name">type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>text<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span> <span class="token attr-name"><span class="token namespace">v-model:</span>value</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>data<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span><span class="token punctuation">></span></span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="23"></td><td><pre><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>input</span> <span class="token attr-name">type</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>text<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span> <span class="token attr-name">v-model</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>data<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span><span class="token punctuation">></span></span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="24"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="25"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment">&lt;!-- v-on:click=" " 点击事件 --></span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="26"></td><td><pre><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>button</span> <span class="token attr-name"><span class="token namespace">v-on:</span>click</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>add(函数)<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span><span class="token punctuation">></span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>button</span><span class="token punctuation">></span></span> <span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;</span>button</span> <span class="token attr-name">@click</span><span class="token attr-value"><span class="token punctuation attr-equals">=</span><span class="token punctuation">"</span>add<span class="token punctuation">"</span></span><span class="token punctuation">></span></span><span class="token tag"><span class="token tag"><span class="token punctuation">&lt;/</span>button</span><span class="token punctuation">></span></span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="27"></td><td><pre> methods:&#123;</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="28"></td><td><pre> add:function()&#123;</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="29"></td><td><pre> this.num += 5</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="30"></td><td><pre> &#125;,</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="31"></td><td><pre> add2(x)&#123;</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="32"></td><td><pre> &#125;</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="33"></td><td><pre>&#125;</pre></td></tr></table></figure>

item.title: second
